querystring.select: SELECT AC.FULL_ASSET_NAME AS FullAssetName, VAT.ASSET_TYPE_NAME AS AssetTypeName, AC.COLLATERAL_VALUE_AMT AS CollateralPrice, ACR.OWNER_NAME As OwnerName, AC.COLLATERAL_NOTES AS CollateralNotes, AC.APP_COLLATERAL_ID AS AppCollateralId
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_COLLATERAL AC WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP_COLLATERAL_REGISTRATION ACR WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_COLLATERAL_ID = ACR.APP_COLLATERAL_ID JOIN dbo.V_ASSET_TYPE VAT WITH(NOLOCK) ON VAT.ASSET_TYPE_CODE = AC.ASSET_TYPE_CODE
